definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)

sentences.english: Heat oil. Add Chng Kee's Sambal Belacan Chilli Paste and stir-fry until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 用熱油翻炒莊記參芭芭拉煎辣椒醬至香味溢出。

sentences.english: Turn the heat down and stir briefly and let cook for about 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 轉小火，稍微翻炒，大約5分鐘。

sentences.english: Add in black fungus,bell pepper and carrots.
sentences.chinese: 隨放木耳，青椒絲和胡蘿蔔絲大火翻炒。

sentences.english: Fry chopped onion in a heavy-based casserole pot with olive oil.
sentences.chinese: 在炒鍋中加油和黃油，倒入洋蔥，翻炒。

sentences.english: Cook risotto for a further 2 minutes until asparagus and peas are tender.
sentences.chinese: 繼續翻炒意飯2分鐘，一直把蘆筍和青豆炒熟。

sentences.english: Add the garlic and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until aromatic.
sentences.chinese: 加蒜瓣，翻炒1分鐘，直到炒出香味。

sentences.english: Add squids , Chng Kee's Light Soya Sauce and water, stir-fry and bring to boil .
sentences.chinese: 加墨魚及莊記生抽王，略翻炒後，加水慢煮至滾。

sentences.english: Lastly, stir in maltose and stir well to blend.
sentences.chinese: 最後，加入麥芽糖，翻炒混合均勻。

sentences.english: Add the garlic and sauté, stirring, for about 30 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 並且加入大蒜，炸的火候大些，翻炒30秒左右。

sentences.english: With stainless steel liner, stir evenly, easy to operate.
sentences.chinese: 採用不鏽鋼內膽，翻炒均勻，操作方便。

sentences.english: Heat oil in pan. On medium heat add potatoes a few slices at a time so they don't stick together.
sentences.chinese: 用炒鍋中溫熱油，依次加入幾片土豆翻炒，使不粘連。

sentences.english: Season with chicken powder and salt and sprinkle with chilli oil. Stir-fry all together until pieces are well-coated with sauce.
sentences.chinese: 用雞精和食鹽調味，淋入辣椒油翻炒均勻後盛盤。

sentences.english: Heat wok with oil, add, ginger, spring onion, bell pepper, and cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 加熱油鍋，入姜蔥，紅椒和白菜幫翻炒。

sentences.english: Stir in garlic, ginger and masala. Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 加入大蒜，生薑與黃姜粉翻炒大約5分鐘。

definition: to stir-fry in a small quantity of oil
to stir-fry before broiling or stewing
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
